pageProduct.name: Sambucol Kids Immunity 50 Gummies
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Great tasting gummies to help support children's healthy immune system function.

Sambucol Black Elderberry Immune Defence Kids are a great tasting chewable gummy with Black Elderberry, Vitamin C, Zinc and Honey. Whether at rest, play or in the classroom they help support:

- Immune system health

- General health and wellbeing

Boxed Contents: 50 Gummies

Size: 50 Pack

Warnings

Vitamins and minerals can only be of assistance if dietary intake is inadequate. Not to be given to children under 2 years of age. Contains gluten, pollen, propolis, royal jelly, sugars, sulfites and soya bean products. No artifical colours. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing.

Ingredients

Each Pastille (Gummy) contains:
Sambucus nigra (Black Elderberry)
fruit juice powder 15.8mg
equivalent to fresh juice 500mg
Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 25mg
Honey 50mg
Zinc (as Zinc oxide) 1.5mg

Directions

To help support healthy immune system function in children:
Children 2-4 yrs: take 1 - 3 gummies per day.
Children 5-12 yrs: take 2 - 5 gummies per day.

Vitamins and minerals can only be of assistance if dietary intake is inadequate. Not to be given to children under 2 years of age. No artificial colours.

Contains gluten, pollen, propolis, royal jelly, sugars, sulfites and soya bean products. Pollen can cause severe allergic reactions. Propolis can cause allergic reactions. Royal Jelly can cause severe allergic reactions, do not use if you have asthma or allergies.

Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing. Store below 25°C.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.
